name: Drawn Down Abyss
description:
Drawn Down Abyss is a platformer card game that takes a unique action oriented approach. Travel down The Abyss, build a deck of cards for abilities, and defend yourself from the local wildlife on your way.

Features:

  • Action packed combat based on the effects of cards.
  • Tons of cards and strategies.
  • Lots of unique of enemies that you must defend yourself from.
  • 3 different zones to encounter on your journey.

Something must be down there...
